amendment.description: An amendment to reduce funds for Automation Modernization by $7,655,000 and increase funds for the Federal Emergency Management Agency National Predisaster Mitigation Fund by $7,655,000.
amendment.purpose: Amendment increases funding (by offset) for the National Predisaster Mitigation Fund by $7.655 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Tipton amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Tipton.
